      • GestureData

        public GestureData(java.lang.String name,
           GestureState state,
           java.util.Collection<HandData> hands,
           boolean live)
        Parameters:
        name - The unique name of this gesture
        state - The state this gesture is in during the current frame
        hands - The hands this gesture is tracking
        live - Whether the gesture is live or not
